content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

TRUNCATE TABLE  [dbo].[FactRentals]

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INT;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(RentalSK), 0) FROM [dbo].[FactRentals]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[FactRentals] (
    [RentalSK],
    [TransactionID],
    [CustomerSK],
    [LocationSK],
    [MovieSK],
    [RentalDateSK],
    [ReturnDateSK],
    [RentalDuration],
    [RentalCost],
    [LateFee],
    [TotalCost],
    [RewindFlag]
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.TransactionID) AS RentalSK,
		ExternalTable.TransactionID AS TransactionID,
		ExternalTable.CustomerSK AS CustomerSK,
		ExternalTable.LocationSK AS LocationSK,
		ExternalTable.MovieSK AS MovieSK,
		ExternalTable.RentalDateSK AS RentalDateSK,
		ExternalTable.ReturnDateSK AS ReturnDateSK,
		ExternalTable.RentalDuration AS RentalDuration,
		ExternalTable.RentalCost AS RentalCost,
		ExternalTable.LateFee AS LateFee,
		ExternalTable.TotalCost AS TotalCost,
		ExternalTable.RewindFlag AS RewindFlag
	FROM (
		SELECT
			NULL AS RentalSK,
			ren.SourceSystemTransactionID AS TransactionID,
			dcus.CustomerSK AS CustomerSK,
			ren.SourceSystemID AS LocationSK,
			mov.MovieSK AS MovieSK,
			rendat.DateSK AS RentalDateSK,
			retdat.DateSK AS ReturnDateSK,
			CASE
				WHEN DATEDIFF(d, ren.RentalDate, ren.ReturnDate) < 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE DATEDIFF(d, ren.RentalDate, ren.ReturnDate)
			END AS RentalDuration,
			ren.RentalCost,
			ren.LateFee,
			ren.RentalCost + ren.LateFee AS TotalCost,
			ren.RewindFlag
		FROM
			[ext].[rentals] ren
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimDate] rendat
			ON ren.RentalDate = rendat.DateValue
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimDate] retdat
			ON ren.ReturnDate = retdat.DateValue
		JOIN
			[ext].[catalog] cat
			ON ren.MovieID = cat.SourceSystemMovieID
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimMovies] mov
			ON cat.Title = mov.MovieTitle
		JOIN
			[ext].[customers] cust
			ON ren.CustomerID = cust.SourceSystemCustomerID
		JOIN
			[dbo].[DimCustomers] dcus
			ON cust.LastName = dcus.Lastname
			AND cust.FirstName = dcus.FirstName
			AND cust.AddressLine1 = dcus.AddressLine1
			AND cust.ZipCode = dcus.ZipCode
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.TransactionID NOT IN (SELECT TransactionID FROM [dbo].[FactRentals])

-- Check Load

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [ext].[rentals]
UNION
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[FactRentals]
